Texts.Chs: ^orange;木质筛粉机^reset;虽然需要电力，但能让你从^orange;沙子^reset;，^orange;泥土^reset;和^green;其他松散的材料^reset;筛选出隐藏的好东西，非常有用。木质筛粉机很慢，但我们没必要抱怨免费的资源。现在就试着建造一个^orange;木质筛粉机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Wooden Sifter^reset; requires power, but allows you to toss in ^orange;Sand^reset;, ^orange;Dirt^reset; and ^green;other loose materials^reset; and sift for hidden goodies. Very useful. The wood sifter is quite slow. But one cannot complain about free resources. Try building a ^orange;Wooden Sifter^reset; now.

Texts.Chs: 如果你是高端玩家，可以尝试建造一个^orange;物品转移装置^reset;和^orange;储存桥接器^reset;，然后将它们连接到^green;筛粉机^reset;！你就能够把资源自动从手工工作站转移到存储容器中！
Texts.Eng: If you want to step up your game, try creating a ^orange;Item Transferrence Device^reset; and a ^orange;Storage Bridge^reset;, then link them to the ^green;Sifter^reset;! You'll be able to automatically transfer from a crafting station to a storage container!
